

/****************

DOCUMENTATION THE "STATIC" KEY WORD 1.4.1

****************/


public class MyClass2 {



	public static char DoSomething(char bob){

		return (char) (bob);

	}

	public char DoSomethingElse(char bob){

		return (char) (bob);

	}

}



public class MyClass {

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        // TODO Auto-generated method stub

        MyClass2.DoSomething('P');

        MyClass2 Character2 = new MyClass2();

        Character2.DoSomethingElse('M');

        System.out.println(MyClass2.DoSomething('P'));

        System.out.println(Character2.DoSomethingElse('M'));

 
   }

}





/**************

DOCUMENTATION THE "STATIC" KEY WORD (GETTERS & SETTERS) 1.4.2

**************/




public class MyClass2 {

	String name;
	byte age;
	static short NumberOfStudents = 0;

	MyClass2(){

		NumberOfStudents++;

	}

	public static short getNumberOfStudents() {

		return (NumberOfStudents);

	}

	public String getName() {

		return (name);

	}

	public void setName (String name) {

		this.name = name;

	}

	public byte getAge() {

		return (age);

	}

	public void setAge(byte age) {

		this.age = age;

	}
	
}




public class MyClass {

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        // TODO Auto-generated method stub

        MyClass2 patrick = new MyClass2();

        MyClass2 victor = new MyClass2();

        MyClass2 mayamiko = new MyClass2();

        MyClass2 moses = new MyClass2();

        MyClass2 ulunji = new MyClass2();

        MyClass2 precious = new MyClass2();

        System.out.println(MyClass2.getNumberOfStudents()); // 6 students in totall

   }

}



public class MyClass {

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        // TODO Auto-generated method stub

        MyClass2 patrick = new MyClass2();

        System.out.println(patrick.getNumberOfStudents()); // 1 student in total

        MyClass2 victor = new MyClass2();

        System.out.println(victor.getNumberOfStudents()); // 1 + 1 = 2 students in total

        MyClass2 mayamiko = new MyClass2();

        System.out.println(mayamiko.getNumberOfStudents()); // 2 + 1 = 3 students in total

        MyClass2 moses = new MyClass2();

        System.out.println(moses.getNumberOfStudents()); // 3 + 1 = 4 students in total

        MyClass2 ulunji = new MyClass2();

        System.out.println(MyClass2.getNumberOfStudents()); // 4 + 1 = 5 students in total

        MyClass2 precious = new MyClass2();

        System.out.println(precious.getNumberOfStudents()); // 5 + 1 = 6 students in total

   }

}
